name: No Rest!
description:
No Rest!

You are a musician in a concert and every second that passes you get less attention. To last as much as possible you will need more attention and to get it, you will have to control gravity to make a musical note move. This note will have to collect the yellow musical clefs in order to last longer, but be careful, you will also have to dodge some red musical rests which would make you last less. Good luck!

Controls:

W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys: Change Gravity Direction.

Esc: Pause Game.
